pageTitle: Rachel Pally Waverly Rib Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 23in / 53.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS COLOR: Please refer to still photos for accurate color representation. Made in the USA. Dry clean. 95% rayon/5% spandex. Fabric: Soft, ribbed jersey. A fun tie-dye print adds bursts of color to a flattering, ribbed jersey top from Rachel Pally. The breezy silhouette begins with a gathered boat neckline, flattering the shoulders and effecting a rippled texture throughout. The gathered elastic hem adds subtle volume. Cap sleeves. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Rachel Pally minored in Dance at the University of California-Berkeley, and this background cultivated her appreciation for grace, fluidity, and expression. These elements may just be the backbone of every piece in the designer's collection. Rachel Pally takes the incredible comfort of jersey and gives it a luxurious and sophisticated look. The designs are timeless and sexy, and it's no surprise, as the designer counts Catherine Deneuve and Martha Graham among her muses.
